com.facebook.buck.parser

Class PartialGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.parser.PartialGraph

  • public class PartialGraph
extends Object
    A subgraph of the full action graph, which is also a valid action graph.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static PartialGraph createFullGraph(ProjectFilesystem projectFilesystem, Iterable<String> includes, Parser parser, BuckEventBus eventBus) 
      static PartialGraph createPartialGraph(RawRulePredicate predicate, ProjectFilesystem filesystem, Iterable<String> includes, Parser parser, BuckEventBus eventBus) 
      static PartialGraph createPartialGraphFromRoots(Iterable<BuildTarget> roots, RawRulePredicate predicate, Iterable<String> includes, Parser parser, BuckEventBus eventBus)
      Creates a partial graph of all BuildRules that are transitive dependencies of (rules that pass predicate and are contained in BUCK files that contain transitive dependencies of the BuildTargets defined in roots).
      static PartialGraph createPartialGraphFromRootsWithTests(Iterable<BuildTarget> roots, RawRulePredicate predicate, ProjectFilesystem filesystem, Iterable<String> includes, Parser parser, BuckEventBus eventBus)
      Creates a partial graph of all BuildRules that are either transitive dependencies or tests for (rules that pass predicate and are contained in BUCK files that contain transitive dependencies of the BuildTargets defined in roots).
      static PartialGraph createPartialGraphIncludingRoots(Iterable<BuildTarget> roots, Iterable<String> includes, Parser parser, BuckEventBus eventBus)

                                                RawRulePredicate predicate,

                                                                BuildFileParseException,
                                                                IOException,
                                                                InterruptedException
        Creates a partial graph of all BuildRules that are either transitive dependencies or tests for (rules that pass predicate and are contained in BUCK files that contain transitive dependencies of the BuildTargets defined in roots).
        Throws:
        BuildTargetException
        BuildFileParseException
        IOException
        InterruptedException

                                       Parser parser,
                                       BuckEventBus eventBus)
                                                throws BuildTargetException,
                                                       BuildFileParseException,
                                                       IOException,
                                                       InterruptedException
        Creates a partial graph of all BuildRules that are transitive dependencies of (rules that pass predicate and are contained in BUCK files that contain transitive dependencies of the BuildTargets defined in roots).
        Throws:
        BuildTargetException
        BuildFileParseException
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • createPartialGraphIncludingRoots

        public static PartialGraph createPartialGraphIncludingRoots(Iterable<BuildTarget> roots,
                                            Iterable<String> includes,
                                            Parser parser,
                                            BuckEventBus eventBus)
                                                     throws BuildTargetException,
                                                            BuildFileParseException,
                                                            IOException,
                                                            InterruptedException
        Like createPartialGraphFromRootsWithTests(java.lang.Iterable<com.facebook.buck.model.BuildTarget>, com.facebook.buck.parser.RawRulePredicate, com.facebook.buck.util.ProjectFilesystem, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String>, com.facebook.buck.parser.Parser, com.facebook.buck.event.BuckEventBus), but trades accuracy for speed.

        The graph returned from this method will include all transitive deps of the roots, but might also include rules that are not actually dependencies. This looseness allows us to run faster by avoiding a post-hoc filtering step.

        Throws:
        BuildTargetException
        BuildFileParseException
        IOException
        InterruptedException
